content.question: Which of the following approaches would best decrease the impact of frequent flooding in a community that is subject to the hazard of flooding?

choices.label: Construct wetland areas near the rivers and streams.
Remove forested areas around all streams and rivers and change land use to agriculture.
Increase the height of natural levees downstream from the community.
Encourage developers to build housing developments on the floodplain.

content.answer: Construct wetland areas near the rivers and streams.
